entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is present in the scene and interacting with Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a person who is speaking to Harry and nodding in approval.

entities.name: ogden
entities.description: Ogden is a person who is being spoken about by Harry.

entities.name: parseltongue
entities.description: Parseltongue is a language that Dumbledore and the man in rags are speaking.

entities.name: man in rags
entities.description: The man in rags is a person who is advancing on Ogden with a knife and wand.

entities.name: snake
entities.description: A dead snake is lying on the door, which Harry sees and suddenly understands.

relationships.description: Harry understands Dumbledore's explanation of Parseltongue.
Harry is concerned about Ogden and wants to know why he can't speak Parseltongue.
Dumbledore is speaking Parseltongue with the man in rags.
The man in rags is advancing on Ogden with a knife and wand.
Harry sees the dead snake on the door.
